mapper.insert: insert into tbl_goods (goods_no, goods_nm, makr, goods_category, goods_img, goods_info_img, goods_info_text) values (#{goods_no}, #{goods_nm}, #{makr}, #{goods_category}, #{goods_img}, #{goods_info_img}, #{goods_info_text})
insert into tbl_goods_option (goods_no, goods_amount, goods_untpc, goods_size, goods_color) values (#{goods_no}, #{goods_amount}, #{goods_untpc}, #{goods_size}, #{goods_color})
